name: Sidewinder Mk I
description: The Sidewinder Mk I is the default starter ship provided to all new pilots. While lightly armed and fragile, it is agile and cost-effective, perfect for training and short-range missions.

name: Eagle Mk II
description: The Eagle Mk II is a fast and nimble ship often used for combat training and bounty hunting. While fragile, its maneuverability is unmatched among small ships.

name: Hauler
description: The Hauler is an early-game cargo ship with excellent jump range and low cost. It can also be outfitted as an inexpensive explorer.

name: Adder
description: The Adder is a balanced multipurpose ship capable of light combat, trading, and short-range exploration. It's a solid step up from the Hauler or Sidewinder.

name: Viper Mk III
description: The Viper Mk III is a nimble and affordable combat ship, ideal for bounty hunting and interdictions. Its iconic profile and speed make it a staple in security fleets.

name: Viper Mk IV
description: The Viper Mk IV trades some of the Mk III’s speed for more armor and module slots. It’s a rugged brawler that can take hits while delivering steady firepower.

name: Cobra Mk III
description: The legendary Cobra Mk III is one of the most versatile and iconic ships in the galaxy. It's fast, agile, and capable of taking on almost any role with the right outfitting.

name: Cobra Mk IV
description: The Cobra Mk IV is a more armored version of the Cobra Mk III with additional internals. However, its sluggish maneuverability makes it less favored in combat.

name: Cobra Mk V
description: The Cobra Mk V builds on the legendary legacy of the Cobra series with improved heat management, hardpoint placement, and better loadout flexibility.
